name: HashiCorp Vault on Cloud Run
shortDescription: Deploying popular open-source secrets management tool using all GCP cloud-native services: Cloud Run, Artifact Registry (GAR, GCS), Secret Manager, Cloud KMS and Cloud Build to tie it all together.
longDescription: Deploying popular open-source secrets management tool using all GCP cloud-native services: Cloud Run, Artifact Registry (GAR, GCS), Secret Manager, Cloud KMS and Cloud Build to tie it all together.
